website_summaries.verdict: No-wait waffle maker that's easy enough for kids to use.
pros: Makes deep and delicious waffles that may transport you  to a breakfast dreamland
Well-balanced waffles that aren't too big or small
Can cook four waffles at one time
Nonstick surface makes waffles easy to remove
cons: Some had issues with the handle breaking

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!  Hot Crispy Belgium Waffles!
customer_reviews.text: Some waffle makers don't get hot enough and you wind up with steamed waffles that take forever to cook. This maker heats up fast, cooks fast and makes big crispy waffles. You can completely trust the indicator lights too. When its ready its ready. The non-stick coating is very good as well. You won't need the mess of non-stick sprays. Really love this machine. Pretty easy to clean too with wet or dried batter wiping right off the surfaces. The overflow tray at the bottom could probably be a little bigger since batter can still drool onto the counter top. I put paper towels underneath for each cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: M. Henson

customer_reviews.title: handle snapped
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY horrible. handle just snapped off on the 3rd use!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be fun to follow the provided recipe for cinnamon bun waffles; the recipe is on the inside of the box. Yea, that was a mistake. There is so much grease on the waffle iron that it seems impossible to clean. I just bought this machine and will likely toss it. Thanks, Black & Decker. Don’t buy this product - spend the money and get something with removable plates.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones at the fancy hotel!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely am satisfied with this product! My son loves waffles and the first time he tasted one of these, my wife smiled real big and threw out the frozen ones we buy him all the time. Now we have more room in our freezer! No, really, my son absolutely loves them and so do I. We are never going back to frozen waffles again! When we took our son to a resort for vacation recently he love the waffles at the bar in the morning. I love the fact that you can make other types of waffles other than the traditional breakfast ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Burns waffles
customer_reviews.text: I find it impossible to replicate the delicious waffles I got from my 8 year old (and now dead Hamilton) waffle maker. Thought I’d try one with the rotating feature. The normal house recipe comes out burnt (but still editable hence two stars). Following their instructions if waffle is burnt leads to waffles sticking. I think the secret is the lack of a temperature control (which the old Hamilton has) so I’m going to try a different one with that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Lid does not stay open
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker is decent, the waffles are good, even if not as thick as some other waffle makers. My biggest gripe with this thing is, that when you open the lid up, it does not take much to knock it off balance and then whole thing flips to the right, which makes it a lot less fun when you are making waffles and the waffle iron is super hot. Overall, I think that it is a major design flaw, and I have had better flip waffle makers in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Lucie Crispian

customer_reviews.title: It had ONE job...and it failed miserably.
customer_reviews.text: So, so disappointed with this product. Everything was fine until about the third waffle. I followed the instructions to a T, made sure not to overload the waffle maker, and yet when attempting to pour in the batter the safety lock on the side broke and the entire thing tipped, spilling (thank god I put the plate in to catch the batter, but it was still a complete mess). It also wouldn’t close fully, even from the first waffle. Just overall a ridiculous experience. I had high hopes for this, and am still holding out hope that it was just a manufacturer’s defect.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Clark

customer_reviews.title: Waffles forever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I had been eying this for a while and finally got it -and I'm not sorry! The waffles come out great! a little crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. Each waffle takes about 4 minutes (in the meantime i put the other ones in the oven in low heat so they don't get cold) And as a plus I learned that you can freeze them and just pop them in the toaster later! this is the recipe i use: (makes 3 waffles) 1 cup all purpose flour 1/4 cup sugar 1 tbsp baking powder 1 cup of milk 1 egg 1 tbsp melted butter
customer_reviews.author: Marcelay!

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: Received this yesterday and made breakfast for dinner last night. It was taking forever to cook the first waffle. I stood there waiting for the ready light and then I smelt burning. The waffle was burnt and ready indicator light does not work. This resulted in me either having to open the maker to check it so it wouldn’t burn or bending down to look at the ready light that’s on top that tells you when it’s hot. I will be returning this item today..! It was a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Received this and used it right away. I brushed the grates with olive oil using a paper towel and let it pre heat while I prepared the batter. I poured just under one cup in the middle and let it spread. I closed the top and immediately flipped it, a tip I red in another review. Less than 4 mins later I had a perfect waffle. Absolutely no spill or waffle left on the grates. I'm quite pleased and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Renee

customer_reviews.title: failed again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this waffle maker a year ago for the second time and use it 4 times at our summer cottage. It stopped working and will not heat up or turn on just like the last one. There seems to be no easy fix. When it was working I really like it5 , but very frustrating that it failed so quickly and using it four times. I took excellent care of it and never washed it, just wiped it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Peaks Island

customer_reviews.title: There's room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Overall, not a bad waffle maker BUT there is definitely room for improvement with the design. The handle that doubles as a "lock" is loose and wobbly. I'm not sure if my waffle maker is just defective or if this is an overall design flaw but it makes it feel cheap. Having said that, it does the job and makes waffles quickly without burning. It's not that easy to clean but if you use waffle makers regularly then you already know that. lol Bonus points for the little drip plate underneath that comes with the maker. It's handy. I give this 3 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: This is a good waffle iron.
customer_reviews.text: This makes excellent waffles, essentially identical to those I get from waffle irons in a hotel or motel. The key is the temperature control. I made one test waffle that I threw away, as per instructions, and have made several waffles that I have eaten. What else can I say? As far as I am concerned, this makes waffles that are good enough to eat, Yum!
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Lunde

customer_reviews.title: It’s recommended that you use a third of a cup of ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m still trying to get the hang of this product. I’ve only used it once so far, and it hasn’t blown me away yet. It’s recommended that you use a third of a cup of the batter when pouring it into the center of the griddle. Followed that direction, and ended up with less than half of a pancake. I think a better option is to pour the batter outwards, than just in the center. I’m not giving up though. It’s still a good product. I just need to work with it more. The waffles were great though. They were really thick and definitely mimicked Belgium waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, cooks well, but durability is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: Cooks waffles fast, easy to use. But could be better made. After 6 uses the plastic covers on the LEDS have broken off. It doesn't have removable griddles so its not so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Even I managed to make a nice thick fluffy golden waffle my first try. I had tried a couple other waffle makers and ended up returning them because the results were kind of sad. I do wish however that this waffle maker had a temperature control however because I like crispy waffles and it would be nice to have a setting to make them browner to eliminate the guesswork.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 3 uses. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Was a great product until the handle broke after using it a handful of times. My husband was so disappointed as he had been wanting a waffle maker like this and was so excited only for it to break.
customer_reviews.author: Rhegan

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: We really loved this waffle iron, but it only lasted three months. My kid pulled it out of the cupboard (right next to the floor) and it broke in two places. This was disappointing considering we upgraded from the waffle iron I inherited from my Grandma that lasted us four kids and over two decades and was still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every other Saturday to make waffles with my kids in the morning. They absolutely love it, and it's a blast for everyone! I do wish that the drip plate was a little larger, to catch overflow better in the rare instances that we overload it a little, but that's a pretty minor gripe about an otherwise amazing waffle maker!
customer_reviews.author: JoeTheOak

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well with periodic use
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for many months now and it has held up well. Our previous waffle iron stopped heating properly after a few months and started taking longer and longer to cook waffles. This one has had no problems. It is kind of a pain cleaning all the nooks and crannies in the waffle iron, but nothing really sticks to the surface, so it is not particularly difficult, just a lot of little spaces to clean out.
customer_reviews.author: Sparx

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Bought this for my son (18) and he uses it just about every day, as long as I keep some waffle mix made up and in the fridge. Timing is just right so you get a crunchy, but not burnt, waffle. The directions didn't really say how much batter to use, so there was a little guess-work there.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Handle fell off
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time and within two waffles, the handle had broken off. I'd read this in other reviews and decided to try fixing it, but the plastic where the screw was supposed to go into was stripped. It was returned and I got a different one. It made great waffles but the handle thing is no bueno.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: When my husband and I went on vacation a few years ago, the hotel had a waffle maker and I was determined to find the same one. If this isn't it then it's pretty dang close! Super easy to use and keep clean! Timer tells you when the waffle is done! Simple.
customer_reviews.author: grumpyshampoo

customer_reviews.title: Makes some darn' good waffles!
customer_reviews.text: We have been needing a waffle maker in our life for years, and now we finally have it. It couldn't get easier to use this thing. It basically cleans itself, we have never had leftover hard residue or anything like that. Just needs a wipe down after each use and it's good to go! It's a little bulky, but it's worth it; The waffles this beauty creates are BIG. Overall we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! However it arrived broken. We didn’t realize it u tilnit was to late and now we are stuck with the broken waffle maker. We have had this exact product before and it was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: DeegiesMum

customer_reviews.title: Nice non-stick finish needs very little cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Nice non-stick finish needs very little cleanup; recommended. Sadly, the cooking surfaces are FLAT, which cooks/cuts the waffle into quarter rounds and are awkward to remove. Due to this flat design, the pockets or wells often have holes which will not retain syrup. I recommend using the imaging magnifier to check the surfaces for this flat design flaw in all manufacturers, and look for a small recess where the quartering divider meets the outer batter retainer IF you want a classic waffle. Instructions should be READ FIRST, as they explain many unknown facts such as never to use cooking sprays ! They tried, but Black & Decker should stick to manufacturing tools. Best Wishes and Bon Appetit fellow foodies!
customer_reviews.author: BSchauerte

customer_reviews.title: No temp setting, over cooks
customer_reviews.text: This gets the job done, but not very well. There's no temperature setting so it's always piping hot and the outside cooks way faster than the middle. If you let it cook until the light goes on, you'll end up with a burnt waffle. Stopping it when the waffle is still edible means it splits in the middle. It still tastes okay though. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waffle Machine that keeps going
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product in late 2014 and it still works great. We use it a maybe twice a month and the product is a great value for the price and I can’t think of a reason to by any other for more money. The waffles come out consistently nicely done. The unit is somewhat easy to clean and does not consume a lot of space. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: a great little waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this waffle iron is fantastic. Even include a tray to catch any excess waffle mix. When the light comes on, put in the mix and close and flip it. When it stops steaming, it's ready to eat. Perfect every time. I've found that it is not even necessary to use any oil to keep it from sticking, it doesn't stick.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Lewis

customer_reviews.title: This makes FANTASTIC waffles!
customer_reviews.text: I had put off buying a waffle iron, convincing myself that I didn’t need one and that waffles aren’t THAT good. Luckily, my reservations were overruled by my stomach. This iron makes some AWESOME waffles! There is no plain waffle recipe included, so I just use a tried and true pancake recipe. The waffles are scrumptious with syrup or warmed up frozen strawberries. They also freeze well and can be reheated in a toaster. The iron itself feels a bit flimsy, but doesn’t look like it would break anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra P

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the price. Can't beat it for under $20!! My waffles came out perfect. The only downside is, it's a NIGHTMARE to clean, they even say in the directions to not get it wet! P.S.- I would also advise against making the cinnamon rolls waffles recipe on the box.....my waffle maker has never recovered from all the burnt on cinnamon roll sugar....and you really can't scrub it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this waffle maker.
customer_reviews.text: I used this waffle maker almost every day for protein waffles. The waffles are cooked to perfection every single time. My only gripe about this product is that it doesn't beep when the waffle is done. The light turns green and you hear a soft click, but not something that could be heard from the other room. So the only downside is having to keep your eye on the waffle maker... other than that, no complaints especially for the price. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Simply Great
customer_reviews.text: There is no guessing with this waffle iron. The temp is automatic/preset for a perfect cook. If you like your waffle with more crunch just leave it cooking a little longer. The rotate allows for even cook. I like the folding handle making more compact for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Durfee

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great waffle maker for the 3 times we used it. Then it broke. The base might as well been made out of glass. Super disappointed as we only had it a couple months and now we are SOL. Do yourself a favor and look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: How hard can it be to make a waffle maker, I said. I'm sure it'll be fine, I said... Either undercooks or overcooks; no temperature control. Hate it and wish I had spent more on a good one with a variable temperature control since I know it's not made with durable, heavy parts like your grandma's old waffle maker had that didn't need temperature control. It's basically a horizontal toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product
customer_reviews.text: Cooks waffles perfectly! Cleaning it, is a little challenging since the machine is a one piece unit. I lay the machine on its side, on the counter next to the sink to clean, which can be messy. Since we use the machine once in awhile, I don’t the cleaning process.
customer_reviews.author: stan

customer_reviews.title: this product was sold out,I waited due to reviews  and so happy I did.
customer_reviews.text: this waffle iron is easy to use, totally non stick, light weight and the price was right. I would have paid double for such quality. dont think just buy it and call it a day, you'll be glad you did! thanks guys your awesome
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Its really down to personal preference with these. But I used this item in a commercial kitchen and it did not let me down. Dont expect it to last forever, but to me it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anand Ramtahal

customer_reviews.title: Makes waffles, what more could you ask for
customer_reviews.text: Never made a waffle in my life besides freezer to toaster, but figured I’d give it a go. Once it arrived, completely ignored the instructions and hit it with a healthy coating of butter flavored Pam, plugged it in and let it get hot. Dumped on the batter, closed the lid, flipped it about 30 seconds in, and when the green light came on, out came a perfect tasting and looking waffle, no mess, no stick, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Spoelman

customer_reviews.title: I love my waffle iron
customer_reviews.text: This waffle Iron was very easy to use. The waffles turned out perfect, CRISP (Which was what I wanted) and fluffy. Flip it right after adding the batter, and when the green light comes on (3 minutes or so) it's done. I was worried after reading a couple of reviews that maybe there would be issues, but I had absolutely zero problems. I gave consideration that no matter what, you will come across at least one bad review no matter how good the product is. Since there were more good reviews than bad ones, I went for it. Glad I did. I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Christine H.

customer_reviews.title: Waffle maker for you
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a waffle maker so I took a browse around and this seemed like the best option for a value seeking person also looking for decent quality - we used it twice in the first week and it went awesome! Highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Reading

customer_reviews.title: Breakfast Changer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this waffle maker! I'm nearly 60 years old and said to my daughter " I don't know why I didn't buy one of these before." I mean breakfast is so much more fun with this waffle maker. You can't go wrong! Breakfast of waffles with or without chocolate chips in it or on it, whipped cream, fresh fruit, especially strawberries, it's fabulous! Up your breakfast game with this waffle maker! Invite friends over for a waffle bar brunch and have fun! I am enjoying my waffle maker! Did I say waffle maker enough...lol.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves to cook for us!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Bought it for our 13 year old granddaughter who loves to cook when she comes to visit. This is a novelty for her and she loves it!! Makes great light and fluffy, yet crispy waffles..great price too.
customer_reviews.author: goat

customer_reviews.title: Flip the Waffle
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the items many times but my complaint is not adjustment for light/dark waffle. One has to guess, EACH TIME, how much more time is needed if it is desirous of a darker waffle than the "standard". The grill is not forgiving of less than a full amount of batter to make a waffle. The waffle will drive the mix to a few sections and leave some sections very thin and undercooked. A positive is the lights that indicate the iron is hot and ready and a separate light to indicate when the waffle is done cooking. I have yet to determine the value of "flipping" the waffle.
customer_reviews.author: John Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions.
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker is great. As long as you follow the directions you will get the best waffles. It took me about three tries before they were perfect. So happy to have gotten this.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I’m highly impressed. I thought it would take me a few tries to get it right, but nailed it the first time. Very easy to use and my 13 year old son loved how the waffles came out.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a waffle maker for the first time. It came on time and works great! Waffles larger then you think. Very filling. Made 2 per person...everyone was stuffed and we had left overs! Great for family time on a Sunday morning ❤️🥳
customer_reviews.author: Almondretto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect waffles every time
customer_reviews.text: I have used this way more then I thought I would. My family loves the waffles and we have now made it a Sunday thing bef7my son's football games to have "game day waffles". Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: Mrsevalovin

customer_reviews.title: The perfect waffle every time!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best kitchen gadgets I have bought ever! It is so simple to use and you get a perfect waffle every time! Easy to clean, it's made very well and it's a perfect size for EZ Storage! Can't go wrong with Black & Decker!
customer_reviews.author: Donna H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Waffles Scott!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good waffle maker that makes outstanding waffles! I like the dish at the bottom which catches any overflow that comes out when you close it. No matter how much you try, there will always be overflow. It's a good addition that some other waffle makers don't have. It's very easy to clean out and cranks out waffles in about two and a half minutes. I have no complaints about it ... it was a very good buy at a very good price. I think this has the ability to outdo the other more expensive waffle makers.
customer_reviews.author: Molecule Inc

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great waffle maker and the price is awesome. Made my waffles fast and non stick ( use cooking spray of course on both sides). Easy clean up with a paper towel wipe down. Heated up fast too. I love the flip option. I am very pleased with this waffle maker and would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES WALKER

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: It's only been used one time so far but it met my expectations. I left it 2 additional minutes after the ready light for a darker crisp waffle. Great for meal prep too.
customer_reviews.author: Brand4Him

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this waffle maker! Super easy to use and you get here hang of it after one or two waffles. I made my own makeshift portion cup so I never have to worry about my portion being to big or small. Super easy to clean if you use some spray for the waffle :)
customer_reviews.author: Celina Santin

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This one is simply a waffle maker, nothing fancy, if you only just a waffle maker it's great. You should not expect the brown-ness nor degree of crispiness.
customer_reviews.author: Marvellux

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy clean up,
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, easy to use. It doesn't seem like you can rely on the green "done" light. I use a kitchen timer for two minutes and the waffle is perfect. Waffle comes right out, non stick, easy to clean. Just wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: Julie H.

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Having issues with it just flipping to one side suddenly, while I'm filling it with mix. Caused me to get burned a couple times. I have to make sure it stays propped on my mixer or it'll flip and dump out the mix but also burn the hell out of me.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this model
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently on the phone with the company who makes them. My waffle maker got stuck as I was turning it. Not worth it. Now my house smells like burnt waffle
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Akins

customer_reviews.title: good price and style
customer_reviews.text: my niece loves waffles so i bought her a waffle maker. we have one that is ages old. i hope this one lasts as long. i like the fact that it can flip.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lehnert

customer_reviews.title: If you want consistent waffles, my mom says spend more money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom... She says that it worked really well the first few times, but now the waffles are not cooking evenly...She's not impressed, and I have to buy her another one... So I'm gonna have to spend $ on a waffle maker that cooks consistently.
customer_reviews.author: EBo

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Lights tell you when it’s ready and cooks a perfect waffle every time. I have used it for regular, whole wheat and gluten free. No recipe adjustments necessary. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen hoey

customer_reviews.title: It's a $20 waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: It's $20 waffle maker don't expect restaurant quality waffles it okay the handle is somewhat flimsy.it's somewhat easy to clean if you do not spell the waffle mix all over the place. In my opinion it's a good $20 waffle maker so go ahead and buy it. And by the way the waffles are about a inch thick like a penny
customer_reviews.author: manuel crespo

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: I really like this waffle maker, also easy to clean, and the drip plate is a blessing no mess, and you could make other things on it like grilled cheese...
customer_reviews.author: javier

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love making these thick waffles.. hard to find them anywhere.. add a little lemon pie filling and super yummy!! Most waffle irons make thin waffles. These are the thick awesome ones .
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Yasher

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING, JUST WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker is amazing, comes out perfect every time, and best part the waffles come out easily no sticking, easy to clean up and use. You can make the family waffles in less than 15 mins. As my 10 year said-great investment. I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: SweetMomma

customer_reviews.title: Household Approves
customer_reviews.text: A staple in our household! The children cannot get enough of the waffles made with this. It's easy to clean and makes the perfect waffle.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly nice! I wasn’t sure what to expect since the price point was so low but it really is a good waffle iron.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: in only 3 months of use the handle already broke! and it's not eligible for return! we didn't use it often, mostly when we had guests, it was very embarrassing on Christmas morning breakfast I was making waffles for them and it broke just like that, I'm a very careful person, so disappointed. UPDATE: great customer service, they sent me a new one and it's working fine, I guess I'll be more careful with the handle now but it's a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: valdostamom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Waffles Every Time
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this waffle iron. It's so easy to use and so easy to clean. I make extra waffles and freeze them. The whole family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: J R.

customer_reviews.title: it sok
customer_reviews.text: lets be clear here. it cooks fast. the ready light on it if you wait will have them burnt. but if you watch it they taste great. I would recommend it just watch the length you cook them.
customer_reviews.author: Specialk2plus1

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me of college
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted something other than pancakes. It takes me back to Sunday brunch in my college days. Plus, I can make and freeze a batch for the kids for the week.
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Buying another one as a gift. Great price. Great quality.

We'll it didn't disappoint. Easy to use, easy to clean.m what more can you ask for. You need to invest in some butter flavored cooking spray to make the waffles crispy.
